# Comprehensive FFmpeg Debug Output Test Fixture
# This file contains representative debug log lines for parser testing.
# Patterns are extracted from real FFmpeg -loglevel debug output.

# === Initial Connection ===
[AVFormatContext @ 0x558f5f5da200] Opening 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/stream.m3u8' for reading
[http @ 0x558f5f5da980] Setting default whitelist 'http,https,tls,rtp,tcp,udp,crypto,httpproxy,data'
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5ddbc0] Original list of addresses:
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5ddbc0] Address 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5ddbc0] Starting connection attempt to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5ddbc0] Successfully connected to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Format hls probed with size=2048 and score=100
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Skip ('#EXT-X-VERSION:3')

# === First Segment Request ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] HLS request for url 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00001.ts', offset 0, playlist 0
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Opening 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00001.ts' for reading
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e43c0] Starting connection attempt to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e43c0] Successfully connected to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[http @ 0x558f5f5e1640] request: GET /seg00001.ts HTTP/1.1

# === Second Segment (keep-alive, no new TCP) ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] HLS request for url 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00002.ts', offset 0, playlist 0
[http @ 0x558f5f5e1700] Opening 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00002.ts' for reading
[http @ 0x558f5f5e1640] request: GET /seg00002.ts HTTP/1.1

# === Third Segment (new connection needed) ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] HLS request for url 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00003.ts', offset 0, playlist 0
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Opening 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00003.ts' for reading
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e4a40] Starting connection attempt to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e4a40] Successfully connected to 10.177.0.10 port 17080

# === Manifest Refresh ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Opening 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/stream.m3u8' for reading
[tcp @ 0x7f6fd4001880] Starting connection attempt to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x7f6fd4001880] Successfully connected to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[http @ 0x7f6fd4001e80] request: GET /stream.m3u8 HTTP/1.1
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Skip ('#EXT-X-VERSION:3')

# === Media Sequence Change (normal increment) ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Media sequence change (100 -> 101) reflected in first_timestamp

# === More Segments ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] HLS request for url 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00004.ts', offset 0, playlist 0
[http @ 0x558f5f5e1640] request: GET /seg00004.ts HTTP/1.1

[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] HLS request for url 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00005.ts', offset 0, playlist 0
[http @ 0x558f5f5e1640] request: GET /seg00005.ts HTTP/1.1

# === Second Manifest Refresh ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Opening 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/stream.m3u8' for reading
[tcp @ 0x7f6fd4002880] Starting connection attempt to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x7f6fd4002880] Successfully connected to 10.177.0.10 port 17080

# === Media Sequence Change (normal) ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Media sequence change (101 -> 102) reflected in first_timestamp

# === More Segments ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] HLS request for url 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00006.ts', offset 0, playlist 0
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] HLS request for url 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00007.ts', offset 0, playlist 0
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] HLS request for url 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00008.ts', offset 0, playlist 0

# === Third Manifest Refresh ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Opening 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/stream.m3u8' for reading
[tcp @ 0x7f6fd4003880] Starting connection attempt to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x7f6fd4003880] Successfully connected to 10.177.0.10 port 17080

# === Media Sequence Skip (discontinuity - segments missed) ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] Media sequence change (102 -> 105) reflected in first_timestamp

# === TCP Connection Failure Scenarios ===
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e5000] Starting connection attempt to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e5000] Connection refused
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e5100] Starting connection attempt to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e5100] Connection timed out
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e5200] Starting connection attempt to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e5200] Failed to connect to 10.177.0.10 port 17080

# === Recovery After Failures ===
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e5300] Starting connection attempt to 10.177.0.10 port 17080
[tcp @ 0x558f5f5e5300] Successfully connected to 10.177.0.10 port 17080

# === More Segments After Recovery ===
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] HLS request for url 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00009.ts', offset 0, playlist 0
[hls @ 0x558f5f5da200] HLS request for url 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/seg00010.ts', offset 0, playlist 0

# === Manifest with BANDWIDTH (variant stream) ===
#EXT-X-STREAM-INF:BANDWIDTH=2000000,RESOLUTION=1280x720
variant_720p.m3u8
#EXT-X-STREAM-INF:BANDWIDTH=1000000,RESOLUTION=854x480
variant_480p.m3u8
#EXT-X-STREAM-INF:BANDWIDTH=500000,RESOLUTION=640x360
variant_360p.m3u8

# === Progress Output Lines (should be skipped by fast path) ===

[mpegts @ 0x558f5f5e0980] stream=0 stream_type=1b pid=100 prog_reg_desc=
[mpegts @ 0x558f5f5e0980] stream=1 stream_type=f pid=101 prog_reg_desc=
[h264 @ 0x558f5f626b80] nal_unit_type: 9(AUD), nal_ref_idc: 0
[h264 @ 0x558f5f626b80] nal_unit_type: 7(SPS), nal_ref_idc: 3
[h264 @ 0x558f5f626b80] Format yuv420p chosen by get_format().

# === Final Stats (should be skipped) ===
